items.name: Kingslist-Spot
items.purchase_message: Welcome to the Kingslist <@USERID>! Make sure to submit your wallet in <#KLCHANNELID>

items.name: Magical Pantsu
items.purchase_message: Wow you got the best trophy of the world. It smells so good <@USERID>! Have fun with your magical pantsu. It could grant you a wish some day!

items.name: TrapMonkie WL
items.purchase_message: Congratulations <@USERID>, You‘re in the TrapMonkie Whitelist! You don’t have to do anything, we will forward the Information to the Team. Make sure to be in their Discord Server!

messages.help: Type '!market' for interaction with the store and '!send [PingUser] [amountCoins]' to send it to your fren. :-)

success.connected: successfully connected to bot's database in market!
success.purchase: successfully updated doc, player had enough coins!

action.title: Hello stranger! How can I help you?
action.description: Choose an action below, to interact with my services. Of course your data like balance will be private and only seen by you.

items.title: Here are my offers!
items.description: I hope you will find something interesting:

insufficient_balance.title: I'm sorry!
insufficient_balance.description: It seems that your pouch isn't big enough for that purchase. Please earn more Erums 🪙 fighting against the terrible monsters.
